mods.abstract: Page 37 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 shows a handmade chart of cowpea breeds with names and bean samples.; Photograph 2 shows rows of bean crops in a field. A man with suspenders stands in the background.; Photograph 3 shows a pair of hands presenting bean pods among crops in a field.
